name: Warlock: Tower Defence
description:
In an era where magic is met with hatred and scorn all across the continent, the magic loving Count Farin is left to deal with the defence of the kingdom of Turin. With few soldiers left he must rely on his defence tower creation magic to safe guard his homeland while the king is absent. His actions in dire situations causes a historical shift in attitudes towards magic all across the continent.

Features
  • Story driven campaign
  • 5 Chapters
  • 5 Levels per chapter
  • 18 Different towers
  • 6 Elements
  • 3 Range Types
